AboutMe:
I’m a application developer and involved in IT world since 2006, and love to learn new technology and work with open source products. I uses Ubuntu GNOME every where and hate to use Microsoft products.

I uses Python to create Ubuntu Application and web application too. Similarly uses PHP to create web application. And finally QML, still I’m learning my self. For backend I mostly uses MySQL, PostgreSQL and SQLite.
